FuncDef:
The if-match eth-tag-list command configures a matching rule based on an Ethernet tag list.
The undo if-match eth-tag-list command cancels the configuration. The if-match eth-tag-list command configures a matching rule based on an Ethernet tag list. The undo if-match eth-tag-list command cancels the configuration. By default, no matching rule based on an Ethernet tag list is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an Ethernet tag list.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

ExtraInfo: To configure a matching rule based on an Ethernet tag list, run the if-match eth-tag-list command.
